committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To provide for a temporary extension in the method currently being used to determine Government contributions under the health benefits program for Federal employees in the absence of a Government-wide indemnity benefit plan.

summary.text: Extends through 1996 the method for determining Government contributions under the Federal employees health benefits program. Expresses the sense of the Congress that nothing in this Act should be considered to reflect any view on the appropriateness, merits, timing, or any other aspect of any comprehensive health care reform legislation.

titles.title: To provide for a temporary extension in the method currently being used to determine Government contributions under the health benefits program for Federal employees in the absence of a Government-wide indemnity benefit plan.
